name: On the Hook (LittleCopper)
description:
Pull, propel, swing, and fling your way to the top in this grapple-hook-focused prototype: On the Hook! Using the "climb" inspiration, producers from U of U EAE's grad program (Cohort 12) developed a grapple-hook prototype. If continued, this game would feature all the ways you can use a hook/rope combo to move and elevate. This is the ultimate grapple game!

Credits:

  • Gerardo Hernandez
  • Lawrence Song
  • Nate Ayoubi
  • Penny Lewis
  • Ziyang Wang
